Broccoli.NAME: Broccoli
DESCRIPTIONS: For each #yTrap triggered, deal #y8 damage to a random enemy.

Horn.NAME: Horn of the Reincarnator
DESCRIPTIONS: When you would be killed, prevent the damage and reduce your maximum health by #y10, then heal to #y50% of your maximum health. This effect can only trigger once per combat.

Doll.NAME: Doll
Doll.FLAVOR: "Of course, cute things belong to Rena!"
DESCRIPTIONS: If you have not played #ydifferent types of cards in one turn, gain #y6 block.

BrokenHorn.NAME: Broken Horn
BrokenHorn.FLAVOR: A horn imbued with the power of Hanyuu.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add 1 #yRoll #ythe #yDice to your hand.

Pumpkin.NAME: Pumpkin
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, increase your maximum health by #y18, lose #r20 health.

TeddyBear.NAME: Teddy Bear
TeddyBear.FLAVOR: "I won't be fooled by you absolutely next time."
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each battle, apply #b2 #ySeriousInjury to all enemies.
